name: Fetch Full Site to Text
description: This tool fetches the content of an entire website starting from a given URL. It then saves all the text from the site into a single, organized text file on your computer. You can limit the max number of pages it downloads, and the concurrency.
author: @@official.shinkai

outputFileName.description: Output file name to write in the user's home directory.

showFileContent.description: If true, include the full generated text content in the result. Use 'true' to let the AI see the content. Use 'false' to simply create a .txt file.

limit.description: Maximum number of pages to fetch.
